extent: On Friday a small group of friends and I attended a most-righteous Sister Hazel concert at Floyd's Music Store for the third straight, and for the third straight year I was blown away by one of my favorite live bands
Sentence: The Good : On Friday a small group of friends and I attended a most-righteous Sister Hazel concert at Floyd 's Music Store for the third straight , and for the third straight year I was blown away by one of my favorite live bands .
